required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Immunogenicity and Safety of sIPV in a "2+1"Sequential Schedule With bOPV in Infants
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Controlled Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Immunogenicity and Safety of Sabin Inactivated Poliovirus Vaccine (Vero Cell) in a '2+1'Sequential Schedule With Bivalent Oral Poliovirus Vaccine in 2-month-old Infants

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this phrase III clinical trial is to evaluate the immunogenicity and safety of Sabin Inactivated Poliovirus Vaccine (Vero cell) in a '2+1'sequential schedule with bivalent oral poliovirus vaccine in 2-month-old infants

detailed_description.textblock: his study is a randomized, double-blind, active-controlled phrase III clinical trial. The purpose of this study is to evaluate the immunogenicity and safety of sIPV manufactured by Sinovac Biotech Co., Ltd in a '2+1' sequential schedule with bOPV in 2-month-old infants. 240 infants aged between 60-90 days will be randomly assigned into experimental group or control group in the ratio 1:1. The experimental group received sIPV-sIPV-bOPV vaccination schedule at one month doses interval (i.e., month 0, 1, 2), and the control group received wIPV-wIPV-bOPV vaccination schedule at one month doses interval (i.e., month 0, 1, 2). The control wIPV was manufactured by SANOFI PASTEUR S.A.

primary_outcome.measure: The difference between experimental group and control group of type I,III neutralizing antibody seroconversion rate after primary immunization. And the lower limit of 95% confidence intervals of the difference value.
primary_outcome.description: Subjects whose pre-immune antibody level < 1:8 and post-immune antibody level ≥ 1:8, or those whose pre-immune antibody level ≥ 1:8 and the increase of post-immune antibody level ≥ 4 folds are considered seroconverted. Primary vaccination schedule: 3 doses with one month interval between doses (i.e., month 0, 1, 2).

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidences of solicited adverse events (AEs) within 7 or 14 days after each dose of each group.
secondary_outcome.description: Solicited AEs occurred within 7 days (for sIPV) or 14 days (for bOPV) after each injection will be collected.

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence of unsolicited AE within 30 days after each dose of each group.
secondary_outcome.description: Unsolicited AEs occurred within 30 days after each injection will be collected.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of serious adverse events (SAEs) during the period of safety monitoring.
secondary_outcome.description: SAEs during the period of safety monitoring will be collected.

secondary_outcome.measure: Type I,II and III neutralizing antibody positive rate of each group after primary immunization
secondary_outcome.description: Subjects whose post-immune antibody level ≥ 1:8 are considered antibody positive. Primary vaccination schedule: 3 doses with one month interval between doses (i.e., month 0, 1, 2).

secondary_outcome.measure: Type I,II and III post-immune geometric mean titer (GMT) of each group after primary immunization.
secondary_outcome.description: GMT of each group after primary immunization

secondary_outcome.measure: Type I,II and III post-immune geometric mean fold increase (GMI) of each group after primary immunization.
secondary_outcome.description: The GMI is the increase of post-immune GMT from pre-immune GMT.

secondary_outcome.measure: Type I,II and III percentage of subjects with post-immune antibody level ≥1:64 of each group after primary immunization.
secondary_outcome.description: Subjects whose post-immune antibody level ≥ 1:64 will be collected.

intervention.description: Two intramuscular injections of the investigational vaccine (0.5 ml) on Day 0 and Day 30 respectively; Single dose of bOPV (0.1 ml) on Day 60. The investigational Sabin strain inactivated poliovirus vaccine (Vero cell)(sIPV) was manufactured by Sinovac Biotech Co., Ltd . The poliovirus (Live) vaccine type I & type III (Human Diploid cell) ( bOPV) was manufactured by Beijing Bio-institute Biological Products Co., Ltd.

Two intramuscular injections of the control vaccine(0.5 ml) on Day 0 and Day 30 respectively; Single dose of bOPV (0.1 ml) on Day 60. The investigational Sabin strain inactivated poliovirus vaccine (Vero cell)(sIPV) was manufactured by SANOFI PASTEUR S.A. The poliovirus (Live) vaccine type I & type III (Human Diploid cell) ( bOPV) was manufactured by Beijing Bio-institute Biological Products Co., Ltd.

overall_official.affiliation: Jiangsu Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention

facility.name: Pizhou Center for Disease Control and Prevention
